guidance: Add 'planning' to `tag`\n\nThis is equivalent to a [notice of planned procurement](https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/legal_e/rev-gpr-94_01_e.htm#_Toc320546103) in the GPA.

Add 'planning' to `tag`\n\nAccording to [Article XI:4](https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/legal_e/rev-gpr-94_01_e.htm#articleXI) of the GPA, which is reflected in [2014/24/EU](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/eli/dir/2014/24/oj), a contracting authority may reduce time limits by publishing a prior information notice that is not a call for competition.
Add 'planning' and 'tender' to `tag`\n\nThis is equivalent to a [noticed of intended procurement](https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/legal_e/rev-gpr-94_01_e.htm#articleVII) in the GPA.
Add 'planning' to `tag`\n\nThis is equivalent to a [notice of planned procurement](https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/legal_e/rev-gpr-94_01_e.htm#_Toc320546103) in the GPA.

Add 'planning' to `tag`\n\nAccording to [Article XI:4](https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/legal_e/rev-gpr-94_01_e.htm#articleXI) of the GPA, which is reflected in [2014/24/EU](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/eli/dir/2014/24/oj), a contracting authority may reduce time limits by publishing a prior information notice that is not a call for competition.
Add 'planning' and 'tender' to `tag`\n\nThis is equivalent to a [noticed of intended procurement](https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/legal_e/rev-gpr-94_01_e.htm#articleVII) in the GPA.
